Hey guys, this one is working perfectly, but you'll need the IRIX 6.5 Base too, as waldemar72 descriped for a full Installation bundle. I put it on my Octane2. Wonderfull, thx to Waldemar you are the best. I was wondering if you or anybody could seed the flame9515IRIX again, or just the Stone-Lic folder, because I already got the Paradox version but without the Stone-Lic.. that would be great !!! ;-)

Hi everybody!
As you can see I've uploded some useful (I hope) IRIX related torrents. If you have any other (working) IRIX soft - please upload!! Now I also have MSC Patran 2006r1 for IRIX, but did't manage to run it. Any CAD/CAM software is welcome (Catia or Pro/Engineer 2.0 Wildfire for example), Foundry Nuke, Adobe Framemaker 5.5.6, Nichiman Mirai, Liberty Paint, TvPaint 3.6, Toonz, etc. 
Now i'm looking for Barco Creator 7.2. I had it but lost. There is torrent but 0 seeders. I've found it also via emule but again.. 0 seeders.

I hope everything is allright now my friend :) 
And thank you for the torrents you shared ...
Can you be more specific why you couldn't install Patran.
I didn't try it myself ... yet .
Thank you again.
Long Live Irix! (LLI)

HI letrvic!
Is that you who shared Barco Creator 7.2  on emule? If so - thank you very much!! Now I have Barco up and running.

Long live IRIX! Never die!

IRIX 6.5.17 src.tar.bz2 ... it contains the source code for the 6.5.17 release and most surprinsing the source code for the sgi boards proms .. that is something !!!
if you're a sgi fan don't miss it !!!
about new torrents for the irix ... i don't think torrents are so safe anymore ...
